executionStatus.name: executionStatus
executionStatus.description:
Query transactions by their executionStatus.
Accepted values: pending, successful, failed.

transaction.name: body
transaction.description:
The request body can contain only one property:
- transaction (required): Binary payload.

dryrunTransaction.name: dryrunTransaction
dryrunTransaction.description:
The request body can contain three properties:
- transaction (required): Binary payload or a transaction object
- skipVerify (optional, default: false): A boolean indicator to skip the transaction verification
- strict (optional, default: false): A boolean indicator to enable strict mode. When set false, it skips the nonce and signature checks
- skipDecode (optional, default: false): A boolean indicator to skip the auto-decoding of the event data.

senderAndRecipientAddress.name: address
senderAndRecipientAddress.description: Resolves for both senderAddress and recipientAddress.

nonce.name: nonce
nonce.description: Query by nonce. Nonce is only allowed if senderAddress is supplied as a parameter.

transactionEstimateFees.name: transaction
transactionEstimateFees.description:
The request body can only contain one property:
- transaction (required): Transaction object

 Note:
 - The transaction object must contain the following properties: module, command, nonce, senderPublicKey and params.
 - All types of transactions require valid params as defined in the schema except the 'transferCrossChain' (messageFee and messageFeeTokenID can be mocked if not passed).
